message.raw:
Added example script directory with random access example
Move tracknames to be file-based instead of chromosome-based, and
  added _set_tracknames_continuous functionality to deal with setting this
  regardless of the implementation. This move makes accessing tracknames
  fast regardless of the number of sequences if the archive is generated with
  default settings (at most 100 files).
Fixed bug in load_seq where the default implementation was dependent upon
  the number of files, not the number of sequences
